message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.SE

The paper proposes a fault classification method for HPC systems based on machine learning, which involves data analysis and pattern recognition. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) category. Additionally, the paper uses machine learning algorithms, which suggests that it could also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) categories. The paper also discusses the accuracy and computational overhead of the proposed method, indicating that it could belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) category. Finally, the paper focuses on the resiliency of HPC systems, which suggests that it could also belong to the Software Engineering (cs.SE) category.
